EmailTemplate.name: SQL Warm Handoff Response
EmailTemplate.subject: BigCommerce Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for the introduction, {SDR name}. {Prospect name}, great to meet you! {SDR name} and I caught up and I am looking forward to our call.
I like to use this first conversation to: learn a bit about your business gain an understanding of your goals for the next 6 to 12 months hear why you're taking the time to talk with us By the end of the call, weâ€™ll both be able to make an informed decision about next steps. As {SDR name} mentioned, if there is anything specific you'd like to cover, just let me know.
Talk to you {Day of week}!
